name: Hercules
ability: Hold the Line: If the opponent attacks during their turn, roll a die.  If 2 or less, this ability does 1 damage to an opponent at random.

name: Ares
ability: Armorless: If your opponent attacks during their turn, you can choose to roll a die.  If the die is 2 or less, and other warriors are in play, mobility allows you to retreat this Egyptian soldier to avoid damage.

name: Guan Di
ability: Transport Reinforcements: If Sumerian Infantry dies, roll a die, if 2 or less, leave the card in play as a 'reinforcement'

name: Rostam
ability: Peace Treaty: If your opponent attacks during their turn, roll a die, if 3 or less, the opponent cannot attack Hittite soldier next turn.

name: Montu
ability: Crossbow: Roll a die, if 3 or less choose any of the opponent's warriors.  Do 1 damage to that warrior.

name: Ishtar
ability: Sling Stones: If another on of your warriors attacks, roll a die, if 3 or less the attack is raise by 1.
